H0.text: What name was given to the fossils, discovered in 2004, of humans with large feet, that stood about a metre high. Homo Minimus

H1.text: What name was given to the fossils, discovered in 2004, of humans with large feet, that stood about a metre high. Pedemus Humanus

H2.text: What name was given to the fossils, discovered in 2004, of humans with large feet, that stood about a metre high. Nanohomo

H3.text: What name was given to the fossils, discovered in 2004, of humans with large feet, that stood about a metre high. LB1
